home.title: Improve your golf performance through comprehensive strength and conditioning training from Nic Catterall.
intro: Nic Catterall is an Australian high-performance coach, specializing in Musculoskeletal Therapy and Strength & Conditioning for professional golfers on the PGA Tour in the U.S. With over five years of tour experience, plus 10 years of clinical and industry experience across multiple sporting codes, Nic takes a tailored approach to each athlete he works with.

Nic believes in training athletes to be formidable to their core - not just in performance, but in life. By seeking out areas for improvement, enhancing exceptional qualities, and encouraging fluid adaptation, Nic helps his clients succeed in an ever-changing world. He encourages hard and smart work aimed at developing body, brain, and character.

programs.title: Training Programs
intro: Nic offers training programs designed for all levels of competency and exercise experience, which can be performed right at home. Advanced sport-specific coaching is available and personalized with monitoring and communication options at various levels. For more information and purchasing options, click on the links provided here.
